KitKat::

She had fallen asleep in the chamber. Her mind swiming through the 
past and the present. So much had changed since her last times on 
earth. She saw the old wars. Battles from ages past. When she fought 
snake bots, bears, rodents and teridactyles.  She saw a bot, whom she 
recognized, but didn't remember his name. She watched him chase her 
up a hill, rying to catch her.  She saw the same bot get shot in a 
battle. Her memory chip flipped to another scene. She was sitting in 
a large room. She had several bots around her. She was giving them 
instructions and telling them how to perform some tasks. She looked 
to see many faces, some she knew, others she didn't want to see. She 
then saw another picture in her mind. She was in a base. the power 
had been cut so only the emergency lights were on. She saw bodies of 
maxmals and her fellow predacons sprawled on the floor. Killed in 
battle. She had her pistol in hand and ready to use.  She was walking 
down a corridor when she heard a loud whistling sound.  She then felt 
and heard a large explosion directly over head.  The floor shook and 
the base started to colapse around her. A large part of the domed 
ceiling came crashing down on top of her.  She screamed as metal and 
wires came down right on top of her. 

Inside the Cr chamber, she could be heard muttering and then letting 
out a cry in her sleep. 

She was thrust down through many floors of the base and finally into 
the ground.  She then was in pitch black. She didn't see, but felt 
her memory.  She knew she was in pain, but couldn't feel it.  She 
knows she is burried and needs help to get out. She opened her 
commlink, "Megatron, help me."

She mutterrs in her sleep, "Help me."
